pageTitle: Debate Issue: The Minimum Wage Should be Abolished. | Debate.org
textBeforeTable: stuntmancoble 7 years ago Vote Placed by Report this Vote 10 records. 1 through 25 votes have been placed for this debate. Showing Next » 4 3 2 1 Report this Comment This is not a challenge. I've enjoyed reading your debates and just want to throw this topic around with you. Is there anything you believe the government should do for truly unfortunate people? Should the government be there to protect the disabled or mentally retarded? Or should the government just get out of the way so that capable people can live and produce freely under the protection of government and free from its intrusions? Advocate, HandsOff 7 years ago Posted by Report this Comment It is not out of apathy, it is out of compassion that the government must stay
